name: Jambox
description:
Jambox is a first person musical experimentation game. See what sounds you can make!

Gameplay:

Use WASD to move.
Use the mouse to look and to interact.

Play the wall piano! Don't be afraid!

The buttons on top of the wall control automated percussion.

The buttons on the bottom of the wall will change their pitch depending on your placement on the floor.

Audio source files available for free download and usage.

Created for MusicGameJam 2017

More updates to come. Let me know your ideas!
